tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_performance_metrics (
  vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  engine_temperature FLOAT,
  fuel_level FLOAT,
  speed INT
)

CREATE TABLE IssueLogs (
    log_id INT,
    vehicle_id INT,
    issue_description VARCHAR,
    reported_by VARCHAR,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE VehicleMetrics ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    vehicle_id INT, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
    speed FLOAT, 
    engine_temperature FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE FuelConsumption ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    vehicle_id INT, 
    fuel_level FLOAT, 
    fuel_consumed FLOAT, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE EngineHealth ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    vehicle_id INT, 
    oil_level FLOAT, 
    engine_temperature FLOAT, 
    rpm INT 
);

CREATE TABLE VehicleInfo (
	auto_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	vehicle_id INT,
	vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
	manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
	model VARCHAR(50),
	year INT
)

CREATE TABLE EngineMetrics (
	auto_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	vehicle_id INT,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	engine_temperature FLOAT,
	fuel_level FLOAT,
	engine_load FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE TireMetrics (
	auto_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	vehicle_id INT,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	tire_pressure FLOAT,
	tire_temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE BatteryMetrics (
	auto_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	vehicle_id INT,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	voltage FLOAT,
	current FLOAT,
	status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE AlertLogs (
	alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	severity VARCHAR(50),
	message TEXT
)
